text: Hiranmay Sen Gupta (1 August 1934 â€“ 8 January 2022) was a Bangladeshi physicist. He worked in nuclear physics. He published over 200 research papers. He was made a fellow of Bangladesh Academy of Sciences in 1977. Sen Gupta died at a hospital in Dhaka, Bangladesh on 8 January 2022, at the age of 87.Nuclear physicist Hiranmay Sen Gupta dies ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Bangladeshi scientists Category:Physicists Category:People from Barisal Division
title: Hiranmay Sen Gupta
